dict.string:
- This version comes with user profile page which shows user's reviews, public collection, submitted bands & modification history. - You can also search a user by username in Simple Search page. - You can now quickly go to search page or go back to homepage from anywhere. Simply tap the "+" button and properly choose an option. - Fix error retrieving your collection. - Fix crash when picking a release other version. - Fix some silly broken English.
Special thanks to Lenn for his continuous suggestions.
- Fix app crash when username has spaces - Fix left menu item title

- You can now log in with your Metal Archives account. - Manage your bookmarks: add/remove/edit bands/artists/labels/releases. - Manage your collection: add/remove/edit releases. - Fix reminder creation error. - Create reminder from inside a release page.
- You can now create a reminder for an upcoming album. - Fix Today widget background issue. - Display album title/artist name alongside the cover/photo. - Replace some icons & minor UI fixes.

- Homepage section reordering capacity. You now have full control to your homepage layout. - Today widget “Unable to load” fix. - A filter by genre for Upcoming Albums list. Thanks to Andreas for the suggestion. - Split releases are now more informative. All involved bands are listed comparing to only the first band in precedent versions. A band name annotation is also added to involved artists who are band member. Thanks to Lenn, once again, for the suggestion. - A minor typo fix in homepage. Thanks to Matt for pointing out.

- Add annotation to instrumental songs in a release (thanks to Lenn for the suggestion). - Upcoming albums section is now on top of homepage. - Artist page with thumbnails for band's logo and release's cover. - And many more small UI changes.
- Integrate Deezer Search & Preview (30 seconds preview) which allows user to listening to band's top tracks and releases inside the app. - Minor UI improvements. - Fix occasional crashes.
- Fix band lyrical themes not being updated. - Fix crashes on iPad.
Second important update with many UI/UX improvements. - Band/Artist/Release/Label detail page with new design. - Homepage with new layout. - Thumbnails can be tapped. - Search history tracking.
- Fix crashes on iOS 10 & 11. - Add default discography mode option. - Fix Today Widget's height issue
- Support 3 font size options: default, medium, large. - Integrate Push Notification - Some UI improvements - Homepage now loads each section separately.
- Fix crashes on iPad when displaying a list of options

This biggest update since the release of the app comes with various new features and a completely new interface.
- The app now has a homepage with almost everything you can do on the web version: statistics, new archives, latest additions/updates/review, upcoming albums... - Much more informative: items are displayed with thumbnails. - Advanced searches are now supported. - Customizable theme with 4 built-in themes. - Customizable today widget. - 3D touch for quick actions: search, random band.
